```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# Bibliotecas usadas
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
load('shapes.RData')
```

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
p <- shapes %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=shape_pt_lon, y=shape_pt_lat, colour=shape_id, group=shape_id)) +
  geom_path(alpha=.1) +
  geom_point(alpha=.1) +
  coord_equal() +
  theme_bw()
print(p)
```
